resources.string: Mixen lets you create a playlist and share it with friends nearby.
Mixen lets you create a playlist and share it with friends nearby. \n Peak Digital. 2015. All Rights Reserved.
First, enter a name to tell others who you are.
Your username should contain no spaces or symbols, and be fairly short.
Please double check your internet connection and try again later.
We had a problem connecting to Spotify, please check your network connection and try again later.
We couldn\'t find the song you were looking for. Sorry about that.
An error occurred while trying to stream down your music. Sorry about that.
Unfortunately, we couldn\'t find anybody nearby. Sorry about that.
The queue is empty! Add a song to get started.
There are no users connected yet.
We had a problem streaming from Spotify. Another device may be using this Spotify account. Please logout on the other device and try again.
